price: (29) [This is] so that the People of the Scripture may know that they are not able [to obtain] anything from the bounty of Allāh[1636] and that [all] bounty is in the hand[1637] of Allāh; He gives it to whom He wills. And Allāh is the possessor of great bounty.
arabic: لِّئَلَّا يَعۡلَمَ أَهۡلُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ أَلَّا يَقۡدِرُونَ عَلَىٰ شَيۡءٖ مِّن فَضۡلِ ٱللَّهِ وَأَنَّ ٱلۡفَضۡلَ بِيَدِ ٱللَّهِ يُؤۡتِيهِ مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَٱللَّهُ ذُو ٱلۡفَضۡلِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ
footnotes:
[1636]- As long as they refuse to believe in the message of Allāh which was conveyed through Muḥammad (ﷺ).
[1637]- See footnote to 2:19.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International

meta.transliteration: li-allā yaʿlama ahlu al-kitābi allā yaqdirūna ʿalā shayin min faḍli al-lahi wa-anna al-faḍla biyadi al-lahi yu'tīhi man yashāu wal-lahu dhū al-faḍli al-ʿaẓīmi
